213311 - 
THE WEST MIDLAND BIRD CLUB
DUE DOCUMENTS RECEIVED 
 
 
 
 
Other names  !
None
Governing document  !
RULES ADOPTED 6TH MARCH 1962 AS AMENDED JANUARY 1981
Area of benefit  !
NOT DEFINED IN PRACTICE, WARWICKSHIRE, WOCESTERSHIRE, STAFFORDSHIRE AND WEST MIDLANDS.
Organisation type  !
STANDARD REGISTRATION
Where it operates  !
!
Registration history  !
19 May 1967Registered
Charitable objects  !
TO ENCOURAGE AND ORGANISE THE STUDY OF WILD BIRDS AND PROMOTE THE PROTECTION OF WILD BIRDS AND PRESERVATION OF THEIR HABITATS
Classification  !
